sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { inject, observer } from 'mobx-react'; import { Button, Icon, DatePicker, Card, Timeline, Empty } from 'antd'; import moment from 'moment'; // import Qrcode from './Qrcanvas'; import './index.less' @inject('StatisticsStore') @observer class StatisticsManage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {} } render() { const { RangePicker } = DatePicker; const { detailInfo, searchDate, workInfo } = this.props.StatisticsStore; return
{/* 日期： */}
{detailInfo.name}

工单完成率：{detailInfo.rate}%

工号
{detailInfo.username}
维修次数
{detailInfo.maintainCount}
维修用时
{detailInfo.hours}
平均用时
{detailInfo.avgHours}

工作日志：

{workInfo.length ? workInfo.map(item => (
{item.operateUser}
  • 工单号：{item.workDO.workNo}
  • 故障描述：{item.workDO.description}
  • {item.details&&item.details.map(log => (
    {log.workLogDO.operateType}：{log.workLogDO.createTime}
    ))}
  • 创建时间：{item.workDO.createTime}
  • 完成时间：{item.workDO.expecteTime}
)) : } ,
; } onSearch = () => { const { searchDate, getAllWorkInfo, detailInfo } = this.props.StatisticsStore getAllWorkInfo({ userId: detailInfo.userId, startDate: searchDate[0], endDate: searchDate[1] }) } changeDate = (e, formate) => { this.props.StatisticsStore.searchDate = formate } handelClick = (e) => { console.log(e) this.props.StatisticsStore.columnsType = e.id } } export default StatisticsManage;
